name: semverity
description: semver bump from git and patch tool

scripts.build:
tsc --noEmit && esbuild --platform=node --target=node16 --bundle --minify --outfile=dist/index.min.js --define:__VERSION__=\"$(node dist/index.min.js bump)\" --banner:js='#!/usr/bin/env node' --footer:js='/*!
 * semverity
 * (c) 2022-present Aleksey Korolev
 * Released under the MIT License.
 */' src/main.ts
scripts.release: npm run build && node dist/index.min.js patch --files package.json: package-lock.json:version,packages..version dist/index.min.js --commit bump

author: playmean
